fullplot: Confetti - a mockumentary which follows three couples, competing for the title of Most Original Wedding of the Year: The Musical Wedding, The Tennis Wedding and the Naturist Wedding.
plot: A mockumentary that follows three couples as they battle it out to win the coveted title of 'Most Original Wedding of the Year'.
title: Confetti

tomatoes.consensus: This improvised mockumentary has its funny and even sweet moments, but it's not as witty or sharp as Christopher Guest's offerings.
